data.text: Great hotel, staff friendly & helpful, comfortable room with everything we needed, good breakfast options, the terrace restaurant is fab, highly recommend a drink & their own tapas on the terrace in the evening. Happy to recommend & would definitely stay again.
data.title: First class, highly recommend

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Nancy, 

Thank you for the glowing review! We're thrilled to hear that you had a first-class experience with us. It's wonderful to know that you found our hotel, staff, room comfort, breakfast options, and terrace restaurant to your satisfaction. 

We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay!

Kind Regards, 
Paramjot Randhawa Singh 
General Manager
owner_response.author: PARAMJOT RANDHAWA SINGH

data.text: From the start of our stay at the Hotel REC Barcelona we had wonderful service and lovely rooms. Customer service was excellent at all times. Big shout out to Sanjeev behind the bar and Rodrigo on Reception. Breakfast superb in rooftop bar area. Good location in El Born. We’ll definitely be back!
data.title: Barcelona Break

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear David, 

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Hotel REC Barcelona! We're delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us and that our staff, particularly Sanjeev and Rodrigo, provided excellent service throughout your visit. It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed the breakfast in our rooftop bar area and found the location in El Born convenient. 

We truly appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Barcelona!

Kind Regards, 
Paramjot Randhawa Singh
General Manager
owner_response.author: PARAMJOT RANDHAWA SINGH

data.text:
This was our first visit to Barcelona and although with city breaks we don’t plan on staying in the room/ hotel too long we still are very picky and nervous when searching for the right hotel. This one did not disappoint. 

Reception
Our flight was early (before check in) on arrival and late (after check out) on departure. This was no problem for the hotel as there is a locker room you can use to keep your cases in whilst you go out exploring more the city. 

Safety
There is extra security and safety measures regarding who can go to the rooms / floors and bar area as you have to scan your room key card to access which was great and made us feel very safe. 

Bar area
Bar area on the top floor was calming and some great entertainment such as cocktail making, beer tasting or live music on selected days. We didn’t get a chance to use this but we did arrive half way through a beer tasting to have a quick drink before leaving for dinner and it looked great. There is also a pool however due to drought in Barcelona currently and being March not really the weather to use it, the pool was closed. 

Room
Beautiful rooms, simple yet for us that works. Room has a tv, shower toilet the usual stuff. A small clothing area but we only hung a few things so wasn’t an issue. The best feature I must say was the Bluetooth built in speakers you can connect to and the free WiFi. This was amazing and I know both us and my mother in law in her room used this frequently. 

Room - Constructive Feedback
Only thing I’d give as constructive feedback is it would be great if the standard rooms could have a fridge (not sure if the other rooms have this already) however we like to purchase bottles of water and snacks from a local shop when on any holiday or city break and we have to be selective this time with what we brought back (no fresh milk for e.g). The only other thing is a small pillow selection. My mother in law loved the pillows however, my partner and I found them to be too soft. It would have been nice to have maybe even 1 soft and 1 firm as a selection in the rooms. 

Overall
This isn’t a be all end all for us. We plan to visit Barcelona again in the future and would 100% stay here again. Thank you for having us.
data.title: Great Stay in the City

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Rose, 

Thank you for sharing your experience! We're thrilled to hear that you had a great stay with us in Barcelona. Your feedback is invaluable, and we appreciate your positive comments about our reception, safety measures, and bar area. 

We're glad you enjoyed the ambiance and entertainment options available. We'll certainly consider your suggestions for improvement regarding the room amenities. 

We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Barcelona!

Kind Regards, 
Paramjot Randhawa Singh
General Manager
owner_response.author: PARAMJOT RANDHAWA SINGH

data.text: Enjoyed our stay at REC BCN in Easter ‘24. REC placed in El Born with nice stores and restaurants all around. The staff at REC all very nice and helpful TripAdvisors. We especially enjoyed the El Born tour with Leila to a gallery and local bars.
data.title: Enjoyed REC BCN

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Lars B, 

Thank you for sharing your positive experience! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay at REC BCN and found our location in El Born convenient. It's great to know that our staff members were friendly and helpful. We're delighted that you had a fantastic time on the El Born tour with Leila, exploring galleries and local bars. 

We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Kind Regards, 
Paramjot Randhawa Singh
General Manager
owner_response.author: PARAMJOT RANDHAWA SINGH

data.text:
I ‘ve just spent 5 nights in REC. for a 3 star hotel it is perfect.

Good:
Location ( specially if you are interested in museums and old streets), cleanness, good room size, fair room temperature, good staff.

Not good:
No water in the room, a little noisy, not a good view ( my room)

Vending machine in each floor is a good option. ( unfortunately it didn’t give me bottle of water!)
data.title: Excelente for a 3 star!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at REC.

We're glad you found our hotel ideal for a 3-star establishment, appreciating its location, cleanliness, room size, temperature, and our attentive staff.

Your comments on the absence of water in the room and noise levels have been duly noted, as well as the vending machine issue.

We appreciate your insights, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Warm regards,
Paramjot Randhawa Singh
General Manager
owner_response.author: PARAMJOT RANDHAWA SINGH
